name: King Of Archery - Rescue Animals
description:
There are a group of lovely animals in the circus, and they are loved by the audience. But one day they were taken away by the bad guys and were cruelly. The bad guys do not give them something to eat, and they hang them on the wooden shelf ...

As the head of the circus,you picked up the bow and arrow for your partner, the lovely animals.You must race against time to save them back from the bad guys!

With your bow and arrows aiming to hang the animals of the rope, and accurate shooting, dying animals will be rescued. Note: you have to rescue all the animals as soon as possible, if not rescued in time, they will lose their lives; shooting must also be careful when shooting animals will let them lose their lives faster.

Quickly rescued the animals out, the audience needs them, the stage more need them ... ...
